name: Saurya EnerTech
tag_list: solar-energy, solar-energy-products, solar-products-india, solar-street-light, solar-water-heater, solar-panel, solar-power-plant, solar-module, solar-consultancy, solar-fan, solar-water-purification, solar-swimming-pool, solar-lantern, solar-light, led-l
overview:
Saurya EnerTech is a company that provides solutions for solar energy. They have 3 different arms in solar; Training, Engineering Services and Products.

The training arm is one of the leading solar energy training company. They have multiple workshops, seminars and conferences throughout India. All of them are supported by Ministry of New and Renewable Energy.

The products arm deals is a leading distributor in solar energy products like solar street lights, solar modules, solar water heating solutions, solar fans, solar lighting, solar power plants etc. This is the biggest of the three arms of the company.

Engineering solutions arm provides consultancy services for solar energy products like EPC, O&M, third party evaluation, site assessments etc.

Saurya EnerTech is part of ESG group of companies that has companies in Travel & Living, Renewable Energy, IT consultancy and pharmaceutical.
